customer_reviews.title: BE VERY CAREFUL OF THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write negative reviews, however, this should not be on the market at all to consumers. After only a couple of weeks, the silver "paint?" started wearing off the tube. It gets all over your hands and, subsequently, when you're trying to apply the makeup, you are putting it all over your face. It is a complete mess. My breaking point came when I got some of this silver substance in my eye and had to have my eye flushed out by my doctor. Terribly cheap packaging and dangerous to be putting anywhere near your face. I tried to ask for a refund, but that option is no longer available. Never again.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom, it was suppose to be a light coverage, but it went on heavy and could see all the pores. If you want fuller coverage this is a good product, but if you’re looking for more natural I would pass on it. Unless you have the proper tools and very well complexion
customer_reviews.author: AmeenaEly

customer_reviews.title: Love IT products
customer_reviews.text: Love IT products!! CC + is a daily essential. Great coverage without looking made up. Terrific sun protection - SPF 50. I can't leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Prolix

customer_reviews.title: Possibly not true IT foundation
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy this from Ulta or Sephora but I had an Amazon gift card and needed foundation so I bought from here. I honestly feel like this isn’t the real deal. I bought light because I had medium previously and I’m not as tan, the light was the exact same color as the medium. The consistency seems a bit thicker as well. It still provides good coverage and gets the job done so it works for now. I will just buy it from the store directly in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Burciaga

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open it right away so I was unaware that it was damaged. The cap was cracked and a fair amount had leaked out. By the time I noticed, it was too late to request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, sensitive skin. This broke me out pretty badly and felt like it never fully dried. It left an oily, gross feeling on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. A little more than I usually pay for foundation, but worth the money. It stays on all day and never feels icky.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly r

customer_reviews.title: Great product for aging skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of application, great coverage and no allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: R.C. Hope

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it 3 stars because I ordered the ensuing shade and it was great. Winter came and I went for a shade lighter and it’s got a very orange tint and just not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Tieee

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! All skin is different, for me it works! Light, natural looking, doesn’t clean or melt after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Seasinger

customer_reviews.title: Great natural CC cream with SPF
customer_reviews.text: Love this CC cream. As a man, i didn’t want something that looked clumpy or obvious. This comes on smooth and clean. I use a foundation brush and it looks great. The spf is awesome as well!
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It is not oily (even though my skin is oily) and I feel it protects my aging 52-year-old skin. I have been using it for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: This covers fully and I never look like I have makeup on
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 68 yo person who absolutely loves this product. I keep one at home and one at camp so that I'll never be without it. I'm fair skinned and have lots of skin damage. This covers fully and I never look like I have makeup on. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MAGGIE

customer_reviews.title: The finest BB tinted makeup I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn Chanel, Armani, Bobbie Brown etc...and this is the finest BB tinted face cream I’ve ever used. It goes on like the finest cream and doesn’t crease, look in any way like you’re wearing make up. I couldn’t be happier with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it makeup.  Broken pump.  Don’t buy on amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Broken pump. I never write reviews when this happens but I will never order this expensive make up from Amazon again. It’s too much money to spend on something that doesn’t work and there’s no way to get the make up out in a small enough amount and not waste it.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Falcon

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel like I'm doing something bad to my skin by wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pricey, but really worth it. I don't feel like I'm doing something bad to my skin by wearing it, and it's very light on the skin but gives good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation! It's light and super moisturizing. Great coverage without being cakey and heavy. Matches my skin tone perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: big fan

customer_reviews.title: New Fav foundation!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go to foundation. The coverage is full yet flawless and after using for over three weeks I can definitely say my skin has improved, no blemishes, much more moisturized and a little goes a long way. I’m really impressed and reach for this over my high end brands.
customer_reviews.author: dschwalm

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!!! Its really buildable and light weight. I add a liquid oil primer to the foundation so it's not so drying and it works wonderfully! It's super easy to blend and holds all day. This is my go to foundation for everyday use!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Product was opened and used. Fingerprints were all over the lid and where the makeup comes out. If I could give 0 stars I would !
customer_reviews.author: KJLitch

customer_reviews.title: Best coverage I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This product is lightweight but covers perfectly. The sun protection is just a bonus. This is my favorite foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like he product, but I think half the product was missing from this "supersized" bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Evens skin tone
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. I use mine w a dab of face lotion. Evens out skin tone
customer_reviews.author: Ama

customer_reviews.title: Flawless coverage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this first on QVC and it was incredible. This product came in the day it promised which is not what I have been experiencing from Amazon in the last year but maybe they have their stuff together now. Either way, great product and good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: peace200001

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I've looked alot for foundation with coverage that wasn't too cakey. I like a more natural look, but I have rosacea and veins on my left cheek that are very noticeable. I haven't found anything that looks natural yet covers until this. I won't ever change. This stuff is really amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Welch

customer_reviews.title: Needs to have more color selections.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty picky when it comes to foundation. I read a lot of good reviews for this item, so I thought I’d give it a try. It didn’t really wit out for me. The color was far to light for my skin tone and it really made my skin look dry.
customer_reviews.author: Margie's Ellie
